page_description: Portfolio of Lee Dongwon - Full Stack Engineer with 2 years of experience in React, Python, and cloud technologies
og_description: Full Stack Engineer with 2 years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in React, TypeScript, Python, and AWS.

hero_subtitle: Building scalable web applications with modern technologies
user_centered_desc: With 2 years of professional experience, I've grown from a junior developer to a confident engineer capable of owning features end-to-end. My focus is on creating scalable, user-friendly applications.
proactivity_desc: Self-taught TypeScript, cloud infrastructure, and modern DevOps practices. Active contributor to open-source projects and regularly attend tech meetups to stay current with industry trends.
responsibility_desc: Successfully delivered 15+ features from conception to production. Reduced bug reports by 60% through comprehensive testing strategies and maintained 99.9% uptime for critical services.
customer_oriented_desc: Strong communication skills developed through cross-functional collaboration. Active participant in code reviews and contributed to improving team development processes.
nextbeat_desc: Working as a Full Stack Engineer at Hoikushi Bank! (保育士バンク！). Developing with Svelte/SvelteKit, Nest.js, and Scala.
